body: As usual yam never disappoints. Fantastic hentai.
Bob are you trying to justify f'ing lil kids in real life? I think you need to stop.

i guess i'll weigh in before moving on with my day. think about how much rape, murder, assault, torture, genocide, etc are depicted in most media on a daily basis. some of it even to children. that villainous death ray aimed at the entire city? yeah, that's genocide, or at least mass murder. both far worse than two instances of sex with a minor. which is what's in this manga. and you don't have to only look at the villains either. many heroes kill, steal, assault, and even cause mass destruction quite often. if that kind of stuff is ok to depict in a fictitious manner to children, i don't see any argument against this adult media holding up under scrutiny.

well, i do have some morals about lolicon, but im not complaining, cuz i know what i signed up for. plus this is a hentai site; there are no need for morals here...except for guro cause, fuck that shit
JEEZ CHILL GUYS. I JUST WANNA JACK OFF!
the comments are real in this one
such a fantastically cute and plain loli.

To sum this all up, fuck off with your morality regarding drawings and your troll accounts.
You know this isn't the place for it.

Japan does have sex crimes. Sexual harassment is pretty rampant and sex crimes against minors are easily ignored. There's very few arrests when it comes to real child porn because it was legal to possess it but not make it up until a few years ago. Even the author of Ruroni Kenshin was arrested for CP and he only had to pay 10k dollars, that's pretty light.
When the tokyo metropolitan police said to Stacey Dooley in an interview that they have convicted some 30 child sex abusers...that's shockingly low. Especially when they had seen child prostitutes in the street the night before. The documentary crew was even taken by police for questioning because the pimps called the police on them

Drawn sex with minors is a no no, but if it's written in a book, it's okay? 
The corralation between real sex crimes against children and fictional works are very slim. Most criminal pedophiles don't even know about sites like this or the comics.
Yes, we like these comics, maybe there's something wrong with us, but you know what? We can't even get help because psychiatrists are ordered by law to contact the police and even if you have never touched a child sexually or have real images of actual children in your posession.
You would all be singing a different tune if the age of consent was lower than it is now.

Basically guys the general rule is keep it 2D or stay in fiction. This is fiction. The real bad guys are the asshats that do this crap in real life. If you beat it to real children then your ass should be beaten and penetrated in the showers. If you drop a real girl's panties and take it then you deserve to drop the soap on the shower floor in a room full of pent up criminals.
And this is Japan we're talking about. They draw this shit and they have almost zero sex crimes.
